ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: The Closed Mesh 3D chart demo shows how to create closed mesh using the SciChart 3D Component.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The Closed Mesh 3D chart demo shows how to use [url='http://www.scichart.com/TODO']CustomFreeSurfaceDataSeries3D[/url] and the [url='http://www.scichart.com/TODO']FreeSurfaceRenderableSeries3D[/url] to render closed 3d mesh.
[url='http://www.scichart.com/TODO']FreeSurfaceRenderableSeries3D[/url] allows you to create all kinds of shapes, including Sphere, Cylinder, Disc and free-form mesh shapes, and overlay heightmap, colormap (palette) and contours. Find examples of other shapes in the same section here or visit [url='http://www.scichart.com/TODO']the web site[/url] for more information.
Palette Mode drop-down menu demonstrates different modes of the data representation.
